sentences: Mulle tuleb päevas keskmiselt kakskümmend meili.
context: The word 'meil' has two main meanings in Estonian: 1) email as a concept or means of communication, referring to electronic post generally; 2) an actual email message that has been sent electronically. It can also be used adessively as the form of 'me' (we), meaning 'with us'. In the context provided, it primarily refers to email communication.
